We happily announce to you the draw (P479) of the Free Lottery Company
,online Sweepstakes International program held on 1st May 2007. Your e-mail address attached to ticket number: 56475600 5 4 5 188 with Serial number 5368/02 drew the lucky numbers:3-5-19-25-30-5  which subsequently won you the lottery in the 2nd category.You have therefore been approved to claim a total sum of £600,000(Six hundred  thousand pound sterlings)in cash credited to file KTU/9023118308/03.

Please contact our fiduciary agent:
Mr.Edgar Franklin (CLAIMS OFFICER)
